Invoice Xlsx

This module allows to xlsx report of multiple invoice from the tree/form view.

Invoices

Step 1:

Invoices > Select multiple records from tree view to get Xlsx report.

Step 2:

click on 'Print' button and Select 'Xlsx Report'

Step 3:

now you get xlsx file of invoice.
